chara.textHome:
Once I learned the whole truth,
my pride in myself as a Magical Girl
crumbled to dust...

I felt as though my heart would be
crushed from anxiety and despair.
Now, though...I feel different.
I have a new ideal and goal to fight toward.
I will save you.

Tea served in a luxurious tea set,
alongside a slice of cake.
Let's toast to a most glorious end today.

An end that will serve as the beginning
of a life without pain or suffering.

I feel another bout of holy power
welling up inside of me...

I cannot rest here...
I have a new goal I must accomplish.

The justice I upheld in the past
was a small, petty thing.

It shocked me to realize that,
but thankfully it made me who I am now.

If such a thing as necessary evil exists
in this world, I may be that right now.

I endeavor to become a force of justice,
to transform calamity into blessing.
Yes, I am sworn to that cause.

Welcome. I couldn't decide what to get
this year for Christmas, so I decided
to have a cup of tea.
Any ideas?
The mornings have been so cold lately...

Try to keep warm.
Christmas is coming soon,
you wouldn't want to catch a cold.
It's almost time for lunch.

With all this cold weather lately,
I'm craving something nice and warm.
Maybe I'll make some hot tonight.

Would you come with me shopping?
I wanted to get some ornaments for my tree.

I'm thinking about getting something
extra stylish this year.
It gets really cold during night.
Would you like some hot chocolate?

I usually drink tea, but during the winter,
I also like drinking hot chocolate.
Here, it'll warm you up.
The snow... Isn't it just magical?
Watch as it silently covers the ground.

I hope we get to see some snow
this Christmas too.

We must always fulfill our duties as
Magical Girls.

Besides, if we're naughty,
Santa won't come visit us.
*Giggle* Just kidding.
I wonder how far we can get today.

We have to stay strong, no matter what...
Ready?

My favorite cake shop starts taking
reservations for its popular
chocolate cake this time of the year.
Don't worry, I already have one reserved.
*Giggle*
I really like this outfit, it's cute.

I like wearing special clothes,
especially my Magical Girl costume.
Christmas is one of my favorite holidays.

Looking at the Christmas lights,
doesn't it get you excited?

Even when it's really cold, I love looking at
the stars from the porch during the winter.

The air is crisp and clear,
can't you see them too?

I love listening to Christmas songs
during the holidays.

I even have a CD filled with
some of the most popular ones.

When I lost my family and became
a Magical Girl I became very distant.

I never thought I'd be able to celebrate
holidays with other people like this again.

It's strange... 
Normally at my age you wouldn't
get so excited for Santa,

but every Christmas Eve
I just can't get to sleep.

Did you remember to hang the stockings?
*Giggle*

Merry Christmas.
This present... It's for you.

I heard in many countries, Christmas
is a time when families come together.

Someday, if I ever have my own family...
maybe Christmas will feel a bit warmer.
I will guide you to the light!
I hope you are a little happier now.
This is the path I have laid out for you.
I will not allow anyone else to despair.

My wish is sacred.
I will allow no one to disparage it.
I am Mami Tomoe.

Call on me when times are hard and
you find yourself crushed by despair...
I will deliver you into grace.

I must gain more strength, step by step,
so as to keep this feeling within me...

I cannot rest easy, no matter how powerful
I become...

I need a solution to the
fundamental problem that faces us.
Some things are better left a mystery.

Don't ask questions if you are
not ready to hear the answer.

It's vital to calm your mind before
engaging in battle.

What I need right now, for instance,
is my pre-battle cup of tea.

I've begun to savor my tea
much more as of late.

The sense of relaxation that comes from
taking a sip... It's incomparable.
